trans-unit.source: Add or modify a StorSimple backup schedule
trans-unit.target: Add or modify a StorSimple backup schedule

trans-unit.source: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service to create and edit backup schedules.
trans-unit.target: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service to create and edit backup schedules.

trans-unit.source: To add or modify a StorSimple backup schedule
trans-unit.target: To add or modify a StorSimple backup schedule

trans-unit.source: On the device Quick Start page, click the Backup Policies tab.
trans-unit.target: On the device Quick Start page, click the Backup Policies tab.

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the Backup Policies page.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the Backup Policies page.

trans-unit.source: In the tabular listing of the policies, select and click the policy that you want to edit.
trans-unit.target: In the tabular listing of the policies, select and click the policy that you want to edit.

trans-unit.source: Under general, you can modify the backup policy name.
trans-unit.target: Under general, you can modify the backup policy name.

trans-unit.source: Under schedules, click manage schedules to add or remove schedules.
trans-unit.target: Under schedules, click manage schedules to add or remove schedules.

trans-unit.source: In the Manage Schedule dialog box, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the Manage Schedule dialog box, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Choose an existing schedule or create a new schedule.
trans-unit.target: Choose an existing schedule or create a new schedule.

trans-unit.source: Select the type of backup as local or cloud snapshot.
trans-unit.target: Select the type of backup as local or cloud snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Specify the backup frequency, retention, and starting time of the schedule.
trans-unit.target: Specify the backup frequency, retention, and starting time of the schedule.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText> to save the changes to the schedule.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText> to save the changes to the schedule.

trans-unit.source: In the Volumes section, add or remove the volumes to this policy.
trans-unit.target: In the Volumes section, add or remove the volumes to this policy.

trans-unit.source: Save the changes to this policy.
trans-unit.target: Save the changes to this policy.

trans-unit.source: The Backup Policies page will be updated to save the changes to the policy.
trans-unit.target: The Backup Policies page will be updated to save the changes to the policy.
